paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on a pathogenic variant in the TTR gene associated with hereditary cardiac amyloidosis.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: A genetic study was requested to distinguish between hereditary ATTR (ATTRh) and wild-type ATTR (ATTRwt), revealing a probable pathogenic mutation c.424G>A (p.Val142Ile) in heterozygosity in the TTR gene, thus confirming the diagnosis of ATTRh.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with hereditary cardiac amyloidosis.

variants.segregation_data: The variant is present in the patient diagnosed with hereditary ATTR.
variants.additional_notes: The patient was treated with tafamidis, which is a TTR stabilizer.
key_quotes: A genetic study was requested to distinguish between hereditary ATTR (ATTRh) and wild-type ATTR (ATTRwt), revealing a probable pathogenic mutation c.424G>A (p.Val142Ile) in heterozygosity in the TTR gene, thus confirming the diagnosis of ATTRh.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the variant was clearly described in the case report.
